description.integration: Create and manage Zendesk Talk calls, voice interactions, and call analytics directly from your workflows. Automate call handling, routing, and voice communication to streamline customer support operations and improve call center efficiency.

ai_description.integration: Enables automated creation and management of Zendesk Talk calls, voice interactions, and call analytics within workflows. Streamlines call center processes by leveraging AI to trigger, route, or manage calls and analyze voice communication based on workflow events.
